name: group_archive
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A private channel was archived  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					groups:read 				 The group_archive event is sent to all connections for members of a private channel when that private channel is archived. Clients can use this to update their local list of private channels.
